title: nannu brOvAnika
sahitya:
nannu brOvAnika yOcanA naLina lOcanA


anupallavi

  pannagAshaila nivAsa bhakta pApa nivAraNa shrI vEnkaTaramaNa


caraNam    anayamu ninu golicinavAri Apadalanu tolaga jEsitivani ghanamu gAnu nI kIrtini pogaDE 
janula jUci vinu muccaTa gAnu nI nAmamu vEmaru bADucununEnati vinaya bhaktitODa nIku 
vandana monarinci cAlavODu konna nanu krpa tODanu nA bAdhanutuni mi bAgumIra 
pAlintuvani tanuja samharaNa shrI gOpAladAsa vinuta shrInivAsa nera nammina
